simpleFeatures.description: A large rug that covers most of the floor. It actually feels pretty good to walk on.
simpleFeatures.onInteract: Try as you might, you cannot get the rug off of the floor. Unfortunate, you'd have liked to have taken it with you.

simpleFeatures.description: An iron fitting holds this flickering torch to the wall.
simpleFeatures.onInteract: The torch is firmly secured to the wall; you cannot budge it.

simpleFeatures.description: A dusty web. Probably shouldn't touch it.
simpleFeatures.onInteract: As you reach for the web, a fat, hairy spider skitters out and stares right at you! Maybe backing out of this is the wisest choice...

simpleFeatures.description: An iron chain and cuffs hanging from the ceiling. Nobody is occupying the cuffs at this time.
simpleFeatures.onInteract: Rattling the chains does nothing at all.
